name: Phaseshift (itch)
description:
Written in Java using libGDX. The characters were based off Puck from DOTA 2.

Programmers: Richard McCormack, Brennan Waters

Artist/Composer: David Osgood

Controls:

Player 1(Keyboard): WASD to move, R to fire orb/teleport to orb, and F to phase shift.

Player 2(Keyboard): Arrow keys to move, Space to fire orb/teleport to orb, and M to phase shift.

Xbox controller: Left control stick to move, A to jump, Y to fire orb/teleport to orb, and X to phase shift.
